mapper.select: SELECT userCompany.user_id as userId,userCompany.company_id as companyId,company.company_name as companyName FROM sys_user_company AS userCompany LEFT JOIN sys_company AS company ON userCompany.company_id = company.company_id WHERE userCompany.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id as userId,company_id as companyId FROM sys_user_company WHERE 1=1 and user_id = #{userId} and company_id=#{companyId}
